content:
Computers and Art

The members of the lab collaborated with artist Belu Fainaru on three installations that used computers to animate viewer intreraction.These installations were part of Romanian participation in the 2019 Venice Biennale.

Image of Nicolae Ceausecu superimposed on a portrait by G. Melcher for an interactive display


Alex Nicolau, Belu Fainaru, and Alex Veidenbaum with the Celan avatar in front of the Romanian Pavilion at the Giardini della Bienale in Venice. May 2019

An LA Times article about this project can be found here

Symposium on Computers and Art
